text:
Los Angeles, could be remote.

Lumi (http://lumi.co)

iOS Lead Developer

Developing the new version of Lumityper for iOS. Our app complements our light-sensitive dye products, Inkodye. The app makes it easy mock-up t-shirt designs and order the supplies to print them yourself.

* Experience working with image processing / filters

* Tying in external APIs

* E-commerce/Stripe integration

Show us your work: jobs@lumi.co
